variables.name: random
variables.comment: file name generation, same as java.io.File for now

methods.name: private static Path generatePath(String prefix, String suffix, Path dir)
private static Path create(Path dir, String prefix, String suffix, boolean createDirectory, FileAttribute<?>[] attrs) throws IOException
methods.comment:
* Creates a file or directory in in the given given directory (or in the
     * temporary directory if dir is {@code null}).

methods.name: static Path createTempFile(Path dir, String prefix, String suffix, FileAttribute<?>[] attrs) throws IOException
methods.comment:
* Creates a temporary file in the given directory, or in in the
     * temporary directory if dir is {@code null}.

methods.name: static Path createTempDirectory(Path dir, String prefix, FileAttribute<?>[] attrs) throws IOException
methods.comment:
* Creates a temporary directory in the given directory, or in in the
     * temporary directory if dir is {@code null}.
